pages.text: Baphomet, an ancient $(l:bewitchment:creatures/demon)Greater Demon$() of magic, first name of fire, flame etc. etc. provides $(l:bewitchment:contracts/concept_contracts)Contracts$() to many witches all over the world.$(br2)When $(l:bewitchment:tools/grotesque_stew)Pledged$(), one may trade with them for much cheaper $(l:bewitchment:contracts/concept_contracts)Contracts$(), and more of them.$(br2)Baphomet can be $(l:bewitchment:rituals/summon_baphomet)Summoned$() by any sufficiently strong witch.
